exceptions.exn: In environment X : Set R : relation X Rwf : well_founded (trans R) x : X IHacc : forall y : X, trans R y x -> Acc (trans (plus R)) y y : X Hxy : trans (plus R) y x Unable to unify "trans (plus R) y x" with "eeq R R".

In environment X : Set R : relation X Rwf : well_founded (trans R) x : X IHacc : forall y : X, trans R y x -> Acc (trans (plus R)) y y : X Hxy : trans (plus R) y x Unable to unify "trans (plus R) y x" with "eeq R R".

original: intros x Hacc. induction Hacc as [x _ IHacc]. constructor. intros y Hxy. apply IHacc. apply trans_eeq with R. apply Hxy. apply Hxy.
